msg: TRINIDAD-702 Added a protected constructor receiving a FacesBean.Type instance to SelectOrderShuttleRenderer

author: gawor
msg: fix the cxf/spring issues by hiding the spring classes and resources from the application classloader and by making cxf to use cxf/car module classloader to load spring resources instead of the application classloader
